Translations.Text: Bene Thamudu nabone barahakanye ababa tuza
Bavuze	bati:-	yoh!	tumukurikire	umuntu	umwe	muri	twebwe,	mu vy’ukuri tuzoba turi mubazimiye kandi turwaye mumitwe yacu twese
Oya! mbega niwe yamanuriwe gusa icibutso hagati yacu twese, canke niwe mubeshi yibona
Ejo niho bazomenya uwuhe mubeshi yibona
Tuzobazanira	Ingamiya	y’inyana	kugira	ngo	tubagerageze	gusa,	rero wewe n’ubarabe gusa hanyuma wigumye
Hanyuma ubamenyeshe yuko amazi azogaburwa hagati yabo, uruhande rumwe rw’amazi ruzoba rufise umuhagaritsi wayo
Rero	barahamagara	umugenzi	wabo,	aca	afata	imbugita	abaga	ya ngamiya barayifungura
Mbega ibihano vyanje vyari bimeze gute hamwe n’ugutuza kwanje
Mu vy’ukuri twaraba rungikiye isumo rimwe gusa, baca baba nk’imizira y’uwubaka urugo rw’imizira rusenyagurika
Ntankeka	twagize	iyi	Qur’ani	ntagatifu	ngo	iborohere	n’ugutegera kuriyo, mbega hari n’umwe yibuka
N’abantu bo kwa Lutwi nabone barahakanye ababatuza
Mu vy’ukuri twebwe twabarungikiye iminana dukuye mwo abakurikiye intumwa y’Imana Lutwi (iii) nibo twarokoye mubucagu cagu
Kumihezagiro ivuye iwacu, uko niko duhemba abashima
Mu vy’ukuri niwe yabateye ubwoba bw’ibihano vyacu, mugabo kuribo vyarabateye amakenga muvyo twabatujije
Bamusavye yuko yobaha abashitsi biwe, natwe duca duhumisha amaso yabo, n’ukuba bwira duti:- ni muhonje ibihano vyanje hamwe n’ituza ryanje
Bazindukiwe mugihe co mugitondo n’ibihano vyabandanije kuribo
Tubabwira duti:- ni muhonje ibihano vyanje, hamwe n’ituza ryanje
Ntankeka	twebwe	twagize	iyi	Qur’ani	ntagatifu	ngo	iborohere n’ugutegera kuriyo, mbega hari n’umwe yibuka
